title: [LF SCRIM] [Low-Diamond] SUNDAY, 19:00 CEST - IG: Humorlos
body:
Hello,

the **Academy-Team** of **ENJOY Gaming e.V.** is looking for a team to scrim against.

**When?** -- Sunday, 2nd July -- 19:00.
**Who?** -- Low Diamond (Dia 4 - Plat 1)
**How long?** -- Bo3.

If you're interested, please send me a friend request on league.
My IG: Humorlos

Greetings,
Humorlos
Team Manager of ENJOY Gaming e.V.
